00017 package WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::UsersAssignedToSet;
00018 use base qw(WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor);
00019 
00020 =head1 NAME
00021 
00022 WeBWorK::ContentGenerator::Instructor::UsersAssignedToSet - List and edit the
00023 users to which sets are assigned.
00024 
00025 =cut
00026 
00027 use strict;
00028 use warnings;
00029 use CGI qw(-nosticky );
00030 use WeBWorK::Debug;
00031 
00032 sub initialize {
00033     my ($self)     = @_;
00034     my $r          = $self->r;
00035     my $urlpath    = $r->urlpath;
00036     my $authz      = $r->authz;
00037     my $db         = $r->db;    
00038     my $setID      = $urlpath->arg("setID");
00039     my $user       = $r->param('user');
00040     
00041     # Check permissions
00042     return unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools"); 
00043     return unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "assign_problem_sets");
00044     
00045     my @users = $db->listUsers;
00046     my %selectedUsers = map {$_ => 1} $r->param('selected');
00047     
00048     my $doAssignToSelected = 0;
00049     
00050     # get the global user, if there is one
00051     my $globalUserID = "";
00052     $globalUserID = $db->{set}->{params}->{globalUserID}
00053         if ref $db->{set} eq "WeBWorK::DB::Schema::GlobalTableEmulator";
00054 
00055     if (defined $r->param('assignToAll')) {
00056         debug("assignSetToAllUsers($setID)");
00057         $self->addmessage(CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithoutError'}, "Problems have been assigned to all current users."));
00058         $self->assignSetToAllUsers($setID);
00059         debug("done assignSetToAllUsers($setID)");
00060     } elsif (defined $r->param('unassignFromAll') and defined($r->param('unassignFromAllSafety')) and $r->param('unassignFromAllSafety')==1) {
00061         %selectedUsers = ( $globalUserID => 1 );
00062         $self->addmessage(CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithoutError'}, "Problems for all students have been unassigned."));
00063         $doAssignToSelected = 1;
00064     } elsif (defined $r->param('assignToSelected')) {
00065         $self->addmessage(CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithoutError'}, "Problems for selected students have been reassigned."));
00066         $doAssignToSelected = 1;
00067     } elsif (defined $r->param("unassignFromAll")) {
00068        # no action taken
00069        $self->addmessage(CGI::div({class=>'ResultsWithError'}, "No action taken"));
00070     }
00071     
00072     if ($doAssignToSelected) {
00073         my $setRecord = $db->getGlobalSet($setID); #checked
00074         die "Unable to get global set record for $setID " unless $setRecord;
00075         
00076         my %setUsers = map { $_ => 1 } $db->listSetUsers($setID);
00077         foreach my $selectedUser (@users) {
00078             if (exists $selectedUsers{$selectedUser}) {
00079                 unless ($setUsers{$selectedUser}) { # skip users already in the set
00080                     debug("assignSetToUser($selectedUser, ...)");
00081                     $self->assignSetToUser($selectedUser, $setRecord);
00082                     debug("done assignSetToUser($selectedUser, ...)");
00083                 }
00084             } else {
00085                 next if $selectedUser eq $globalUserID;
00086                 next unless $setUsers{$selectedUser};   # skip users not in the set
00087                 $db->deleteUserSet($selectedUser, $setID);
00088             }
00089         }
00090     }
00091 }
00092 
00093 sub getSetName {
00094     my ($self, $pathSetName) = @_;
00095     if (ref $pathSetName eq "HASH") {
00096         $pathSetName = undef;
00097     }
00098     return $pathSetName;
00099 }
00100 
00101 sub body {
00102     my ($self)         = @_;
00103     my $r              = $self->r;
00104     my $urlpath        = $r->urlpath;
00105     my $db             = $r->db;
00106     my $ce             = $r->ce;
00107     my $authz          = $r->authz;
00108     my $webworkRoot    = $ce->{webworkURLs}->{root};
00109     my $courseName     = $urlpath->arg("courseID");
00110     my $setID          = $urlpath->arg("setID");
00111     my $user           = $r->param('user');
00112 
00113     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, CGI::p("You are not authorized to acces the Instructor tools."))
00114         unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "access_instructor_tools");
00115         
00116     return CGI::div({class=>"ResultsWithError"}, CGI::p("You are not authorized to assign homework sets."))
00117         unless $authz->hasPermissions($user, "assign_problem_sets");    
00118     
00119     # DBFIXME duplicate call
00120     my @users = $db->listUsers;
00121     print CGI::start_form({method=>"post", action => $self->systemLink( $urlpath, authen=>0) });
00122      
00123     print CGI::p(
00124             CGI::submit({name=>"assignToAll", value => "Assign to All Current Users"}), CGI::i("This action can take a long time if there are many students.")
00125           ),
00126           CGI::div({-style=>"color:red"}, "Do not uncheck students, unless you know what you are doing.",CGI::br(),
00127                "There is NO undo for unassigning students. "),
00128           CGI::p("When you unassign
00129                         by unchecking a student's name, you destroy all
00130                         of the data for homework set ".CGI::b($setID)." for this student. You will then need to
00131                         reassign the set to these students and they will receive new versions of the problems.
00132                         Make sure this is what you want to do before unchecking students."
00133     );
00134                         
00135     print CGI::start_table({});
00136     print CGI::Tr({-valign=>"top"}, CGI::th(["Assigned","Login Name","&nbsp;","Student Name","&nbsp;","Section","&nbsp;","Due Date"]));
00137     print CGI::Tr(CGI::td([CGI::hr(),CGI::hr(),"",CGI::hr(),"",CGI::hr(),"",CGI::hr(),"&nbsp;"]));
00138 
00139     # get user records
00140     my @userRecords  = ();
00141     foreach my $currentUser ( @users) {
00142         my $userObj = $db->getUser($currentUser); #checked
00143         die "Unable to find user object for $currentUser. " unless $userObj;
00144         push (@userRecords, $userObj );
00145     }
00146     @userRecords = sort { ( lc($a->section) cmp lc($b->section) ) || 
00147                          ( lc($a->last_name) cmp lc($b->last_name )) } @userRecords;
00148     
00149     # get the global user, if there is one
00150     my $globalUserID = "";
00151     $globalUserID = $db->{set}->{params}->{globalUserID}
00152         if ref $db->{set} eq "WeBWorK::DB::Schema::GlobalTableEmulator";
00153 
00154     foreach my $userRecord (@userRecords) {
00155 
00156         my $statusClass = $ce->status_abbrev_to_name($userRecord->status) || "";
00157 
00158         my $user = $userRecord->user_id;
00159         my $userSetRecord = $db->getUserSet($user, $setID); #checked
00160         # don't need to check here, undefined values are handled below
00161         #die "Unable to find record for user $user and set $setID " unless $userSetRecord;
00162         my $prettyName = $userRecord->last_name
00163             . ", "
00164             . $userRecord->first_name;
00165         my $dueDate    = $userSetRecord->due_date if ref($userSetRecord);
00166         my $prettyDate = ($dueDate)?  '(' . $self->formatDateTime($dueDate) . ') ' : '';
00167         print CGI::Tr({}, 
00168             CGI::td({-align=>"center"},
00169                 ($user eq $globalUserID
00170                     ? "" # no checkbox for global user!
00171                     : CGI::checkbox({
00172                         type=>"checkbox",
00173                         name=>"selected",
00174                         checked=>(
00175                             defined($userSetRecord) # && $statusClass ne "Drop"
00176                             ? "on"
00177                             : ""
00178                         ),
00179                         value=>$user,
00180                         label=>"",
00181                     })
00182                 )
00183             ),CGI::td({},[
00184                 CGI::div({class=>$statusClass}, $user),
00185                 "",
00186                 "($prettyName)", " ", $userRecord->section, " ",
00187                 (
00188                     defined $userSetRecord
00189 ###                 ? $prettyDate . CGI::a(
00190                     ? ($prettyDate, "", CGI::a(
00191                         {href=>$self->systemLink($urlpath->new(type =>'instructor_set_detail',
00192                                                                args =>{courseID => $courseName,
00193                                                                        setID    => $setID
00194                                                                }),
00195                                                  params =>{editForUser=> $user}
00196                         )},
00197                         "",
00198                         "Edit data for $user"
00199                     ))
00200                     : ()
00201                 ),
00202             ])
00203         );
00204     }
00205     print CGI::Tr(CGI::td([CGI::hr(),CGI::hr(),"",CGI::hr(),"",CGI::hr(),"",CGI::hr()]));
00206     print CGI::end_table();
00207     print $self->hidden_authen_fields;
00208     print CGI::submit({name=>"assignToSelected", value=>"Save"});
00209     print CGI::p( CGI::hr(),
00210                   CGI::div( {class=>'ResultsWithError'},
00211                         "There is NO undo for this function.  
00212                         Do not use it unless you know what you are doing!  When you unassign
00213                         a student using this button, or by unchecking their name, you destroy all
00214                         of the data for homework set $setID for this student.",
00215                         CGI::br(),
00216                         CGI::submit({name=>"unassignFromAll", value=>"Unassign from All Users"}),
00217                         CGI::radio_group(-name=>"unassignFromAllSafety", -values=>[0,1], -default=>0, -labels=>{0=>'Read only', 1=>'Allow unassign'}),
00218                   ),
00219                   CGI::hr(),
00220     );
00221     print CGI::end_form();
00222     
00223     return "";
00224 }
